Annotation.String: A group of endpoints that are managed as a unit.
A group of endpoints that shall be managed as a unit.
A group of endpoints that are managed as a unit.
A group of endpoints that shall be managed as a unit.
The value identifies this resource.
The value shall be unique within the managed ecosystem.
Endpoint group type.
The group contains only endpoints of a given type Client/Initiator or Server/Target. If this endpoint group represents a SCSI target group, the value of GroupType shall be Server.
Access State for this group.
Access to all associated resources through all aggregated endpoints shall share this access state.
A defined identifier for this group.

If this endpoint group represents a SCSI target group, the value of this property shall contain a SCSI defined identifier for this group, which corresponds to the TARGET PORT GROUP field in the REPORT TARGET PORT GROUPS response and the TARGET PORT GROUP field in an INQUIRY VPD page 85 response, type 5h identifier. See the INCITS SAM-5 specification.
Access to resource is preferred.

A value of True in this property shall indicate that access to the associated resource through the endpoints in this endpoint group is preferred over access through other endpoints. The default value for this property is false.
The Endpoints.
The value of each entry shall reference an Endpoint resource.
Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
This structure shall contain references to resources that are not contained within this resource.
Contains links to other resources that are related to this resource.
This structure shall contain references to resources that are not contained within this resource.
Describes the options for the access characteristics of an endpoint.
Access to all associated resources through all aggregated endpoints shall share this access state.
The endpoint(s) are in an Active/Optimized state.
In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an Active/Optimized state.
The endpoint(s) are in an Active/NonOptimized state.
In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an Active/NonOptimized state.
The endpoint(s) are in a Standby state.
In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in a Standby state.
The endpoint(s) are unavailable.
In the context of this enumeration literal, each endpoint shall be in an unavailable state.
The endpoint(s) are transitioning to a new AccesState.
In the context of this enumeration literal, at least one endpoint shall be transitioning to a new AccesState.
The group contains the client (initiator) endpoints.
The group contains the server (target) endpoints.
